member.name: T:Samraksh.AppNote.Utility.BitConverter
member.summary: Converts base data types to an array of bytes, and an array of bytes to base data types.

member.name: F:Samraksh.AppNote.Utility.BitConverter.IsLittleEndian
member.summary: Indicates the byte order ("endianness") in which data is stored in this computer architecture.

member.name: M:Samraksh.AppNote.Utility.BitConverter.InsertValueIntoArray(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Inserts a value at a specified position in a byte array.
member.param: The array into which you want to insert the specified value.
The position in the array where you want to insert the specified value.
The value you want to insert into the array.

member.name: M:Samraksh.AppNote.Utility.BitConverter.GetBytes(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns the specified Boolean value as an array of bytes.
member.returns: An array of bytes with length 1.

member.name: M:Samraksh.AppNote.Utility.BitConverter.GetBytes(System.Byte[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns the specified Boolean value as an array of bytes

member.name: M:Samraksh.AppNote.Utility.BitConverter.ToBoolean(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a Boolean value converted from one byte at a specified position in a byte array.
member.returns: true if the byte at startIndex in value is nonzero; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Samraksh.AppNote.Utility.BitConverter.InsertValueIntoArray(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Char)
member.summary: Inserts a value at a specified position in a byte array.
member.param: The array into which you want to insert the specified value.
The position in the array where you want to insert the specified value.
The value you want to insert into the array.

member.name: M:Samraksh.AppNote.Utility.BitConverter.GetBytes(System.Char)
member.summary: Returns the specified Unicode character value as an array of bytes.
member.returns: An array of bytes with length 2.

member.name: M:Samraksh.AppNote.Utility.BitConverter.GetBytes(System.Byte[],System.Char)
member.summary: Returns the specified Unicode character value as an array of bytes.

member.name: M:Samraksh.AppNote.Utility.BitConverter.ToChar(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a Unicode character converted from two bytes at a specified position in a byte array.
member.returns: A character formed by two bytes beginning at startIndex.

member.name: M:Samraksh.AppNote.Utility.BitConverter.InsertValueIntoArray(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int16)
member.summary: Inserts a value at a specified position in a byte array.
member.param: The array into which you want to insert the specified value.
The position in the array where you want to insert the specified value.
The value you want to insert into the array.

member.name: M:Samraksh.AppNote.Utility.BitConverter.GetBytes(System.Int16)
member.summary: Returns the specified 16-bit signed integer value as an array of bytes.
member.returns: An array of bytes with length 2.

member.name: M:Samraksh.AppNote.Utility.BitConverter.GetBytes(System.Byte[],System.Int16)
member.summary: Returns the specified 16-bit signed integer value as an array of bytes.

member.name: M:Samraksh.AppNote.Utility.BitConverter.ToInt16(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a 16-bit signed integer converted from two bytes at a specified position in a byte array.
member.returns: A 16-bit signed integer formed by two bytes beginning at startIndex.

member.name: M:Samraksh.AppNote.Utility.BitConverter.InsertValueIntoArray(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.UInt16)
member.summary: Inserts a value at a specified position in a byte array.

The position in the array where you want to insert the specified value.
The value you want to insert into the array.

member.name: M:Samraksh.AppNote.Utility.BitConverter.GetBytes(System.UInt16)
member.summary: Returns the specified 16-bit unsigned integer value as an array of bytes. This API is not CLS-compliant.
member.returns: An array of bytes with length 2.

member.name: M:Samraksh.AppNote.Utility.BitConverter.GetBytes(System.Byte[],System.UInt16)
member.summary: Returns the specified 16-bit unsigned integer value as an array of bytes. This API is not CLS-compliant.

member.name: M:Samraksh.AppNote.Utility.BitConverter.GetBytes(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.UInt16)
member.summary: Returns the specified 16-bit unsigned integer value as an array of bytes. This API is not CLS-compliant.

member.name: M:Samraksh.AppNote.Utility.BitConverter.ToUInt16(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a 16-bit unsigned integer converted from two bytes at a specified position in a byte array. This API is not CLS-compliant.
member.returns: A 16-bit unsigned integer formed by two bytes beginning at startIndex.

member.summary: Returns a 64-bit unsigned integer converted from eight bytes at a specified position in a byte array. This API is not CLS-compliant.

member.summary: Inserts a value at a specified position in a byte array.

The value you want to insert into the array.

member.name: M:Samraksh.AppNote.Utility.BitConverter.GetBytes(System.Single)
member.summary: Returns the specified single-precision floating point value as an array of bytes.
member.returns: An array of bytes with length 4.

member.name: M:Samraksh.AppNote.Utility.BitConverter.GetBytes(System.Byte[],System.Single)
member.summary: Returns the specified single-precision floating point value as an array of bytes.

member.summary: Returns a single-precision floating point number converted from four bytes at a specified position in a byte array.
member.returns: A single-precision floating point number formed by four bytes beginning at startIndex.

member.summary: Returns the specified double-precision floating point value as an array of bytes.
member.returns: An array of bytes with length 8.

member.name: M:Samraksh.AppNote.Utility.BitConverter.GetBytes(System.Byte[],System.Double)
member.summary: Returns the specified double-precision floating point value as an array of bytes.

member.name: M:Samraksh.AppNote.Utility.BitConverter.ToDouble(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a double-precision floating point number converted from eight bytes at a specified position in a byte array.

member.name: M:Samraksh.AppNote.Utility.BitConverter.DoubleToInt64Bits(System.Double)
member.summary: Converts the specified double-precision floating point number to a 64-bit signed integer.
member.returns: A 64-bit signed integer whose value is equivalent to value.

member.name: M:Samraksh.AppNote.Utility.BitConverter.Int64BitsToDouble(System.Int64)
member.summary: Converts the specified 64-bit signed integer to a double-precision floating point number.
member.returns: A double-precision floating point number whose value is equivalent to value.
